name: The Lighthouse Hero
description:
• 1 min of story (audio log)
  • 3 mins of gameplay

Controls:

  • LMB -> Toggle Lighthouse Light
  • Mouse -> Rotate Lighthouse Light
    • For best results, point mouse at boats

Made for Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment (Theme: End is Near)

Credits:

Everything except items below are done by aaron7eleven.
